official_title: Novel Prevention Intervention Program to Reduce Risky Patterns of Substance Use Among Emerging Adults
inclusion_criteria:
* This study is for emerging adults between 18-25 years who reside in the United States. These individuals must also be English-speaking.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 25 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Participants will be excluded from the study if they are younger than 18 years old, older than 25 years old, reside outside of the United States, or if they do not provide informed consent. These exclusion criteria have been chosen because we are targeting emerging adults (a particularly risky population in terms of substance use behaviors).
